participant_1.background:
I can work from home and still make enough money to provide for my family.
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
my parents own a business that i am now running.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
I work as a park ranger, which allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.

participant_2.background:
I have no siblings, but I have many friends who are like my family.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
i take pride in getting straight a s.
i eat a strictly vegan diet.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for a living?
I am an artist, I love it! I am so happy I have so much support from my family.
That is awesome! I am glad you have a family that supports your passion. I work as a park ranger. I enjoy my job very much, it allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.
That is really neat! I love being outdoors, maybe I will go for a bike ride later!
That sounds like a great idea! I love bike rides too. My favorite music to listen to is death metal. I also enjoy working on robotics projects, I get to do that during my commute.
Death metal? That is intense! I am more of a pop and hip hop person myself. I do like to listen to music while I am biking.
That's cool, everyone has their own taste in music. I like to have some tunes to listen to while I work on my robots. It helps me stay focused.
I can understand that, music can be very motivating. I am glad you have such a great job and a supportive family.
Thank you! I am very lucky. How about you, what are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to spend time with my friends and family, go on bike rides, and listen to music. I also enjoy working on my art projects
